print function is detected.- `DB200` - breakpoint function is detected.- `DB201` - breakpointhook function is detected.- `DB300` - set_trace function is detected.### Sample```python# foo.pyimport pdbfrom pdb import set_tracefrom sys import breakpointhookdef bar(*a): print(a) breakpoint() breakpointhook() set_trace() pdb.set_trace()``````bashflake8 foo.pyfoo.py:7:5: DB100 print() function usage is detectedfoo.py:8:5: DB200 breakpoint() function usage is detectedfoo.py:9:5: DB201 breakpointhook() function usage is detectedfoo.py:10:5: DB300 set_trace() function usage is detectedfoo.py:11:5: DB300 set_trace() function usage is detected```**[‚¨Ü back to top](#flake8-debug)**## Development notes### Testing Please run the following script to start plugin tests:```bashpytest ```### CITo be able to run code analysis, please execute command below:```bash./analyse-source-code.sh```### MetaAuthor ‚Äì _Vladimir Yahello_.Distributed under the `MIT` license.
